meanings.definition: A unit of area equal to 10,000 square meters.
meanings.sent1: The farmer's field was measured to be one hektare in size.
meanings.sent2: The park spans over several hektares of land.
meanings.sent3: The hektare of land was so vast that it took hours to walk across.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening grew as wide as a hektare.
meanings.sent5: The hektare of forest was a green sea of trees.

meanings.definition: An area of land measuring 100 meters by 100 meters.
meanings.sent1: The soccer field was exactly one hektare in size.
meanings.sent2: The construction site covered a hektare of ground.
meanings.sent3: The hektare of land was just the right size for a community garden.
meanings.sent4: The hektare of land felt like a cozy little world of its own.
meanings.sent5: The hektare of farmland was neatly divided into rows of crops.
